reviewText: Harpo as we had not seen him before .
Having played the waiting game in the face of greedy Amazon sellers before, wait until a reasonably priced (i.e., about $20) DVD or VHS tape comes along.  One always does.
Amazing, amusing show. Lot's of Hirshfeld art. Very interesting facts. Many of the people included aren't even in the text. Great look into the "not so innocent " age.
saw this on pbs many, many years ago and have been searching for it ever since.  so happy i finally found it.  a supreme remembrance of a high moment in american literature, warts and all.

We looked for this rare video for many years.  There it was on amazon.
Quick delivery and excellent service.  thanks.
